name: KOTU
description:
This Game is best played with a friend, well can only be played with a friend so if you don't have one atm, You can download the game and play it anytime with your pal ;)

INSTRUCTIONS
Player 1 : WASD
Player 2 : Arrow Keys
Skip Cutscenes/Intro : Enter

note : if html version is laggy or doesn't look like in screenshots, use windows executable for best experience

CREADITS
a game by Inuka(Dreadii) and Gatheesha(gath)! Made within 5 days for SecretSantaGameJam2021.
Music by - TAD, Bogart VGM, omfgdude, migfus20, Tausdei

Feedback is appreciated and Thanks you soo much for Playing :)
